verses.text: Return, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Israel, \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* stumbled \w by|strong="H5307"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* iniquity.

\w Bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* confessions \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Say|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Him|strong="H7725"\w*: “\w Take|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* receive \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w graciously|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* lips.\f + \fr 14:2 \ft LXX and Syriac; Hebrew that we may present our lips as sacrificial bulls\f*

Assyria \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* save \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, \w nor|strong="H2896"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* ride \w on|strong="H3068"\w* horses. \w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* never \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w*, ‘\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* gods!’ \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* hands. \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fatherless \w find|strong="H3947"\w* compassion.” A Promise of God’s Blessing

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* heal \w their|strong="H5921"\w* apostasy; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* freely \w love|strong="H7355"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* anger \w has|strong="H3027"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5750"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dew \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Israel; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* blossom \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lily \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* root \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cedars \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Lebanon.

\w His|strong="H5221"\w* shoots \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w sprout|strong="H6524"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* splendor \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* olive tree, \w his|strong="H5221"\w* fragrance \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* cedars \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

They \w will|strong="H1961"\w* return \w and|strong="H3212"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* shade; they \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w grow|strong="H3212"\w* grain \w and|strong="H3212"\w* blossom \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* vine. \w His|strong="H1961"\w* renown \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* wine \w of|strong="H7381"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Ephraim,\f + \fr 14:8 \ft That is, the northern kingdom of Israel\f* what \w have|strong="H1612"\w* \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H1612"\w* anymore \w with|strong="H3427"\w* idols? \w It|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H1715"\w* \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* watch \w over|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*. \w I|strong="H6738"\w* am \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flourishing cypress;\f + \fr 14:8 \ft Or pine or juniper or fir\f* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* fruit comes \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H7725"\w*.

Whoever \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wise, let \w him|strong="H4672"\w* understand these things; whoever \w is|strong="H4100"\w* discerning, let \w him|strong="H4672"\w* know \w them|strong="H4672"\w*. \w For|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* ways \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* right, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* righteous walk \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w but|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* rebellious stumble \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*.
